__e: Sure, let the politicians and everybody else off the hook.
When I stand up and I see the youth fighting against the youth for the politicians, then I really feel sick.
If you want me, I'll do it, but I am going to rip things up, because I've lived inside of politics and it nearly killed me.
I think that, uh... all politicians are as bad as each other.
For me, politicians are all the same, it's money that counts.
Most politicians are like women, older women, in that they don't care about you.
